name: repellently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you feel strong disapproval or that makes you not want to be involved with someone or something: It's disgraceful how he has such a repellently friendly relationship with the gang boss. I find this reality TV show just repellently exploitative.
More examplesFewer examplesYou should be ashamed of your repellently hard-hearted attitude to these people in desperate need.The foul odours from the rotting food hang repellently in the air.I can't bear the professor's repellently smug manner.
